subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In the space of a few hours, Donnie Walsh, the Knicks’ president, traded Jamal Crawford to the Golden State Warriors and struck a deal to send Zach Randolph to the Los Angeles Clippers.
snippet: In the space of a few hours, Donnie Walsh, the Knicks’ president, traded Jamal Crawford to the Golden State Warriors and struck a deal to send Zach Randolph to the Los Angeles Clippers.
